member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_BUFFER_DESC
member.summary: Describes a compressed buffer for decoding.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_BUFFER_DESC.BufferType
member.summary: The type of buffer, specified as a member of the enumeration.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_BUFFER_DESC.DataOffset
member.summary: The offset of the relevant data from the beginning of the buffer, in bytes. This value must be zero.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_BUFFER_DESC.FirstMBaddress
member.summary: The macroblock address of the first macroblock in the buffer. The macroblock address is given in raster scan order.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_BUFFER_DESC.NumMBsInBuffer
member.summary: The number of macroblocks of data in the buffer. This count includes skipped macroblocks.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_BUFFER_DESC.pIV
member.summary: A pointer to a buffer that contains an initialization vector (IV) for encrypted data. If the decode buffer does not contain encrypted data, set this member to NULL.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_BUFFER_DESC.IVSize
member.summary: The size of the buffer specified in the pIV parameter. If pIV is NULL, set this member to zero.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_BUFFER_DESC.PartialEncryption
member.summary: If TRUE, the video surfaces are partially encrypted.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_BUFFER_DESC.EncryptedBlockInfo
member.summary: A structure that specifies which bytes of the surface are encrypted.
